message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Preface is 2,311 words — length OK?">
The Preface is now 2,311 words after the DRAFT-R2 revision. Is this length appropriate, or does it still need trimming?
</teammate-message>

input.content: 2,311 words is right. It sits comfortably in the standard range for a philosophically complex translation (1,500-3,000), and every section now earns its space. The only section I would have considered cutting further — the new structural claims paragraph (lines 50-51) — actually adds useful conceptual footholds. No further trimming needed.
input.summary: 2,311 words is right, no further trimming

routing.summary: 2,311 words is right, no further trimming
